\w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H6213"\w* \w wooden|strong="H6086"\w* \w platform|strong="H4026"\w* \w built|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5921"\w*. \w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w*, \w Anaiah|strong="H6043"\w*, Uriah, \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, \w Hashum|strong="H2828"\w*, Hash-baddanah, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*.

\w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w view|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* uplifted, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “Amen, Amen!” \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* faces \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*—\w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, \w Shabbethai|strong="H7678"\w*, \w Hodiah|strong="H1941"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Kelita|strong="H7042"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Pelaiah|strong="H6411"\w*—instructed \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stood|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* places.

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H7121"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H8451"\w* God, \w explaining|strong="H6567"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \f + \fr 8:8 \ft Or translating it or paragraph by paragraph\f* \w and|strong="H8451"\w* giving \w insight|strong="H7922"\w*, \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* people could understand what was being \w read|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governor|strong="H8660"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* instructing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w mourn|strong="H1058"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Nehemiah told \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w what|strong="H3559"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* rich, \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w what|strong="H3559"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w sweet|strong="H4477"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* nothing \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w grieve|strong="H6087"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w joy|strong="H2304"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w calmed|strong="H2814"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, saying, “\w Be|strong="H3117"\w* \w still|strong="H2814"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w grieve|strong="H6087"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* began \w to|strong="H3212"\w* eat \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. The Feast of Tabernacles (Leviticus 23:33–44; Zechariah 14:16–21)

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* month, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* families, along \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, gathered around \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* study \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w* \f + \fr 8:14 \ft Or tabernacles or shelters; also in verses 15, 16, and 17\f* during \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w message|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w spread|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6963"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w back|strong="H3318"\w* \w branches|strong="H5929"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w*, \w wild|strong="H6213"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w*,\f + \fr 8:15 \ft Or pine; literally oil tree\f* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w*, \w palm|strong="H8558"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w leafy|strong="H5687"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*.”\f + \fr 8:15 \ft See Leviticus 23:37–40.\f*

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w back|strong="H3318"\w* branches, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w rooftops|strong="H1406"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w courtyards|strong="H2691"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w squares|strong="H7339"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Water|strong="H4325"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ephraim.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* exile \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*. \w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joshua \f + \fr 8:17 \ft Hebrew Jeshua, a variant of Joshua\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w celebrated|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w*.

\w Day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H4480"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* last, \w Ezra|strong="H7121"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God. \w The|strong="H6213"\w* Israelites \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w held|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*, \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w*.
